mapper.sql: id as id, tn_id as tnId, room_name as roomName, room_type as roomType, grade as grade
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_room ( tn_id, room_name, room_type, grade ) VALUES ( #{tnId}, #{roomName}, #{roomType}, #{grade} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_room
tn_id = #{tnId},
room_name = #{roomName},
room_type = #{roomType},
grade = #{grade},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_room
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
room_name = #{map.roomName},
room_type = #{map.roomType},
grade = #{map.grade},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_room ( tn_id, room_name, room_type, grade ) VALUES ( #{map.tnId}, #{map.roomName}, #{map.roomType}, #{map.grade} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_room
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
AND room_name like CONCAT('%', #{roomName} , '%')
AND room_type like CONCAT('%', #{roomType} , '%')
AND grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
